title: Could someone explain this for me - for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++)
snippet: It's a for loop, which will execute the next statement a number of times, depending on the conditions inside the parenthesis.

title: What does for(int i = 0; a[i]; i++) mean? - c++
snippet: In this case "for(int i = 0; a[i]; i++)", your loop keeps its execution until one of its elements are a null element.
